sample.datamodel

Class DataOrganisation

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.datamodel.DataOrganisation

  • public class DataOrganisation
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class that holds information about the directors, actors and genres of each movie. The information is stored in three Hashmaps that have movieIDs as keys and Lists of the corresponding directors, actors and genres respectively.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DataOrganisation getInstance()
        returns the single instance of the class.
        Returns:
        Returns instance of DataOrganisation class.

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        resets the single instance of the DataOrganisation class. This method is only used for testing purposes and is not called in the main program.

      • load_MovieID_DirectorID_Map

        public void load_MovieID_DirectorID_Map()
        Method that loads data into the MovieID_DirectorID_Map from the MOVIE_FILE file. The Map maps all directors that have directed a particular movie.

      • load_MovieID_ActorID_Map

        public void load_MovieID_ActorID_Map()
        Method that loads data into the MovieID_ActorID_Map from the MOVIE_FILE file. The Map maps all actors that have played in a particular movie.

      • load_MovieID_GenreMap

        public void load_MovieID_GenreMap()
        Method that loads data into the MovieID_Genre_Map from the MOVIE_FILE file. The Map maps all genres that are attributed to a certain movie.

      • getMovieID_DirectorID_Map

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> getMovieID_DirectorID_Map()
        Returns:
        Returns a Map that maps the directors that have directed a movie to the corresponding movieID.

      • getMovieID_ActorID_Map

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> getMovieID_ActorID_Map()
        Returns:
        Returns a Map that maps the actors that have played in a movie to the corresponding movieID.

      • getMovieID_GenreMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getMovieID_GenreMap()
        Returns:
        Returns a Map that maps the genres that are attributed to a movie with a certain movieID .
